Text:
I know what you're thinking... aren't the movie AND the special features a bit much for a single layer DVD? Well, kinda... this doesn't exactly look like the retail DVD9 it was compressed from.

If you're not low on bandwidth, are fluent in english (or in any available subtitle language in that version) and have dual layer blank DVDs, I recommend that you check out the 2-Lions-team Full DVD version here on TPB.

Good enough for me on my analog 82cm/32inch widescreen TV. It gives great quality.

So thanxxx a lot
